channel.title: Help requested with SRL
channel.description:
Hi guys, I'd really appreciate any help any of you could offer me. I've been trying to set up the SRL thing in SCAR. I'm using SCAR 3.06 and i used SRL_360_without_Manual.rar. When I tried to run SetupSRL.scar it gave me this error-
Failed when compiling Line 26: [Error] (43:1): Duplicate identifier 'UpChars' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar
Prior to this when I freshly installed SCAR and tried to run some Runescape autominers it gave me an error saying-
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SRL\SRL.Scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SRL\SRL\Skill\Mining.Scar does not exist. Failed when compiling
I'd be really grateful if anyone could help me. :) Thanks.

item.title: Help requested with SRL
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

Are you sure the script that you are using doesn’t use SCAR 2.03 instead of SCAR 3.06?

Read full topic

item.title: Help requested with SRL
item.dc:creator: @HellHunter HellHunter
item.description:
@HellHunter wrote:

Hi guys, I’d really appreciate any help any of you could offer me.
I’ve been trying to set up the SRL thing in SCAR. I’m using SCAR 3.06 and i used SRL_360_without_Manual.rar.
When I tried to run SetupSRL.scar it gave me this error-

Failed when compiling
Line 26: [Error] (43:1): Duplicate identifier ‘UpChars’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar

Prior to this when I freshly installed SCAR and tried to run some Runescape autominers it gave me an error saying-

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SRL\SRL.Scar does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\SRL\SRL\Skill\Mining.Scar does not exist.
Failed when compiling

I’d be really grateful if anyone could help me. Thanks.

Read full topic
